name: Iso-Wars
description:
Submission for the Grads in Games 2020 Rising Star competition.

By Daniel Paul (3rd year Abertay University).

Isometric strategy sandbox game. Build foragers that collect resources for cash and warriors that attack the enemy base whilst the enemy does the same!

Controls (also in the how to play screen in-game):

WASD - Move camera

Scroll In/Out - Zoom camera in/out

Click on icons to spawn units and get the enemy base's health to 0 before they destroy you!
